name: Run Dungeon
description:
Find the Endroom and Run away from enemyies if they catach you they'll be chased!

Use wasd to move and i to pause

Note: the end room looks just like the start room, and you got to stand on the little platform in there to acend

Challenge: See if you can kill an enemy (Left mouse button)

This is a game where you run away from enemyies to get to the next level, it was only such about 15 min before being completed, but that's what it is! :)

This was a game made by:

Bobojo - Coder

Hoseccan - 3D Modeler, Coder

Furkeshu - Musician

Jericoecass - Pixel Art
